name: Crystals Of Power - LD39
description:
Crystals of Power is a fantasy first person shooter made in 72h for Ludum Dare 39, theme "Running Out Of Power".

You are summoned by a group of wizards. They are running out of power and you are tasked with restoring it.

Controls:

-Mouse to aim, WASD or arrow keys to move. Space to jump. 
-Hold Left Shift to sprint.
-Right Mouse Button(hold) to use reflective shield.
-Left Mouse Button to cast fireball.
-Click any button to advance dialogue.
-Click 'Y' to invert mouse Y axis.
-Click 'ESC' to quit game.

Known issues:

-Expect some loading time between scenes.
